itunes:title: 343 - How to Make Deeper Work with Substance that Hits a Lot Harder
itunes:author: Creative Pep Talk
itunes:summary:
Your work is totally on point. You’re doing everything “right” but somehow it’s still falling short. 

Well in the words of Jack Black in the movie School of Rock - “Rock isn’t about getting an A”.

So what is it “about”? What is YOUR art about? In this episode we will dive into what it means to give your art as much substance as it has style, and how it can make your work resonate on a totally different level!
itunes:subtitle:
Your work is totally on point. You’re doing everything “right” but somehow it’s still falling short. 

Well in the words of Jack Black in the movie School of Rock - “Rock isn’t about getting an A”.

So what is it “about”? What is YOUR art about? In this episode we will dive into what it means to give your art as much substance as it has style, and how it can make your work resonate on a totally different level!
